name: x2js
description: Transforms between XML string and JavaScript object trees.

scripts.travistest: npx karma start --single-run --browsers Firefox && npx qunit-cli all_tests.js && npx eslint --env qunit,node --no-eslintrc --config ./node_modules/eslint-config-axinom/index.js *.js
scripts.test: karma start --single-run && npx qunit-cli all_tests.js && npx eslint --env qunit,node --no-eslintrc --config ./node_modules/eslint-config-axinom/index.js *.js
scripts.prepublish: rimraf dist && mkdir dist && npx uglifyjs x2js.js -o dist/x2js.min.js -c -m --source-map "includeSources='true',url='x2js.min.js.map'"

author: Axinom
